Tried to specify a width and min-width on a <col> or a <colgroup> element

comments.text:
HTML4 says that width on a colgroup should apply to each column individually: http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/struct/tables.html#adef-width-COLGROUP

I think CSS sort of says the same thing, but so unclearly that it's not clear it was intentional:

  The following properties apply to column and column-group elements: 
  [...]
  'width'
      The 'width' property gives the minimum width for the column. 

  from http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/tables.html#columns

I'm not sure if HTML5 says anything on the matter.
